channel.title: Welcome to RuneTown!
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img172.imageshack.us/img172/693/dragonarmour1fg3.jpg[/img][/URL]
We are recruiting members for the forums and the server
We currently need
Hosters woofdawg23
Forum Section mods - -
Forum super mods - -
Server mods - - -
Server admins I pwnz nubz
Do you want to apply for a position? if so use this! [code] Name: Msn: Position Wanted: Experience: Proof of experience:(example:links) [/code]
The forums link is rite in my signature
The goal of this server is to make a realistic game that you can actually level faster (not too fast but faster then dodian) this will be a revolutionary server. we already have a professional coder that made us a client and started the server base. if you really want to be a part of this please apply

item.title: Welcome to RuneTown!
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“TeleNubby, post:16, topic:168092”]To be quite honest, this is a Development/Server forum, am I correct? You’re post half belongs here, and in my opinion half doesn’t. If you are recruiting for a dev. team for your server, I am perfectly fine with that. If you are recruiting for a forum, then this is the wrong place for you. Two-fifths, or 40%, of your positions involve some job on the forum you made. Just remember, this is meant for Server Development, not Forum Development. If you want to recruit for your forum, I would personally appreciate it more if you did it somewhere else.[/quote]What he said.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to RuneTown!
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

To be quite honest, this is a Development/Server forum, am I correct? You’re post half belongs here, and in my opinion half doesn’t. If you are recruiting for a dev. team for your server, I am perfectly fine with that. If you are recruiting for a forum, then this is the wrong place for you. Two-fifths, or 40%, of your positions involve some job on the forum you made. Just remember, this is meant for Server Development, not Forum Development. If you want to recruit for your forum, I would personally appreciate it more if you did it somewhere else.

Read full topic

item.title: Welcome to RuneTown!
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

ok thanks 8 ball crazy[quote=“Casey., post:2, topic:168105”][quote author=woofdawg23 link=topic=227593.msg1955789#msg1955789 date=1198754497]

Experience:I’m on 24/7 on weekdns and 15 hours regular nights

So, a weekended is classified as Saturday and Sunday.
That is two days.
Therefore, you are no on 24/7

Name:Casey.
Msn:Dawgw00t@Hotmail.com
Position Wanted:Server admin and forum super mod
Experience:I’ve been here for a while, I consider myself a respected member of both communities.
Proof of experience:(example:links)Don’t have any sorry

[/quote]i sed on WEENDS im on 24/7 also, screw u

Mind telling me what the hell a weends is?[/quote]
and btw casey, it makes me FRICKEN angry when people do that. WHAT THE FRICK DO YOU THINK A WEEND IS IF YOU WERE JUST FRICKEN TALKING ABOUT WEEKENDS - jeez, if you cant comprehend that you then you really should get out

use your fricken imagination, WANNEBE

Read full topic
